description: This Java source file defines the class SendCommandRequest, which represents a request to send a command to a Zigbee device within a mock Zigbee core testing framework. It includes logic for constructing the request from parameters, decoding payloads, and executing the command on a mock device cluster.

classes.name: SendCommandRequest
classes.description: A class representing a request to send a command to a Zigbee device's endpoint, encapsulating command details and execution logic.

methods.name: SendCommandRequest
methods.description: Constructor to create a new SendCommandRequest with specified parameters, decoding payload from Base64.

methods.name: getCommandId
methods.description: Returns the command ID associated with this request.

methods.name: executeDeviceRequest
methods.description: Executes the command request on the supplied mock Zigbee device, dispatching the command to the appropriate cluster.
